- Location: Ceiling HVAC supply register (interior space).  
- Material: Metal grille (likely steel/aluminum), painted white; mounted in textured drywall ceiling.  
- Damper: Manual lever/damper on left side for airflow control.  
- Condition: Louvers intact and clean; no rust or visible moisture staining.  
- Finishing: Perimeter around the frame shows chipped paint and rough finish; small gaps around frame (potential sealing/use caulk refinishing).
